bramble.title: Bramble!
bramble.txt:
Watch out for bramble!

Touching the brambled areas will
cause you to take damage.

doughnut.title: Doughnuts!?
doughnut.txt:
Doughnuts are optional collectables.

One doughnut is hidden in every level.
You must make it to the exit without
dying to keep the doughnut!

pause.title: Taking a Break
pause.txt:
Need a break?

Press "P" to pause the game.

If you need a longer break, just
close the game and come back later.
Your progress will be saved.

restart.title: Sticky Situation?
restart.txt:
Did you screw up?

Did WE screw up?

You can press "J" at any time to
to "Jump" back (reset) the current
level.

hpHUD.title: Stayin' Alive
hpHUD.txt:
Taking damage causes you to lose
hit points (HP).

Your HP is represented by the hearts
located at the top-left of the screen.

If you lose all of your HP you are
VANQUISHED and must restart
from the beginning of the level.

sword.title: Slice 'n' Dice
sword.txt:
You got a sword!

Click or press spacebar
to swing it and destroy stuff.

hpRestore.title: That Feels Better
hpRestore.txt:
Collect hearts to recover lost HP.

Hearts are often hidden in crates.

gatekeeping.title: Gatekeepers
gatekeeping.txt:
Some gates can only be opened
by defeating enemies.

Enemies guarding gates have
blue health bars.

checkpoints.title: Checkpoints
checkpoints.txt:
We all get VANQUISHED once
in a while...

Luckily, checkpoints allow you to
lock down your progress through
a level.

Attacking a checkpoint will
activate it.

shield.title: Protect Me
shield.txt:
The shield is yours.

Hold shift or right-click to block.

You can block enemy attacks
but not environmental hazards.

hp4.title: Heavy Metal
hp4.txt:
You got the armor upgrade!

Your maximum HP has been
upgraded to 4.

stabCombo.title: Power Stab
stabCombo.txt:
You got the power stab upgrade!

Perform a power stab by landing 
three hits in a row.

Your fourth swing will be a
power stab, which deals 2 damage
and can stagger enemies.

speed.title: Speed Kills
speed.txt:
You found mysteriously ergonomic
leather boots!

You can now run around faster.

bow.title: Twang
bow.txt:
You got the bow!

Switch between the sword and bow
by pressing 'E'.

Fire the bow with spacebar or
left-click.

AOECombo.title: Ring of Fire
AOECombo.txt:
Your sword combo attack has been
upgraded to the fire spin combo!

Your combo attack now deals
3 damage and hits all enemies
around you.

hp5.title: Can't Touch This
hp5.txt:
You got the superior armor upgrade!

Your maximum HP is now 5.
